cheeses = ["adam", "bree", "cheDDar", "GOUDA", "camambert"]
print(cheeses)

['adam', 'bree', 'cheDDar', 'GOUDA', 'camambert']

cheeses = ["adam", "bree", "cheDDar", "GOUDA", "camambert"]
del cheeses[3]
print(cheeses)

['adam', 'bree', 'cheDDar', 'camambert']

cheeses = ["adam", "bree", "cheDDar", "GOUDA", "camambert"]
cheeses.pop(3)

'GOUDA'
cheeses = ["adam", "bree", "cheDDar", "GOUDA", "camambert"]
cheeses.remove("camambert")
#cheeses.pop(cheeses.index("camambert"))
print(cheeses)

['adam', 'bree', 'cheDDar', 'GOUDA']
